workData.title: Rent a Car Management System
workData.description: A comprehensive car rental management system built with modern web technologies. Features include vehicle booking, real-time availability tracking, user authentication, payment integration, and admin dashboard for fleet management.

workData.title: EV Charging Station Booking System
workData.description: An innovative platform for electric vehicle owners to locate and book charging stations. Includes real-time station availability, booking management, payment processing, and station operator dashboard.

workData.title: VirtuWear - Fashion E-Commerce
workData.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform for fashion retail with virtual try-on capabilities. Includes product catalog, shopping cart, order management, user reviews, and secure payment gateway integration.

workData.title: Microservices Food Delivery System
workData.description: A scalable food delivery platform built with microservices architecture. Features include restaurant management, order tracking, delivery routing, real-time notifications, and multi-payment options.

workData.title: CareHire Mobile Application
workData.description: A mobile healthcare staffing solution connecting healthcare professionals with facilities. Features include profile management, shift scheduling, in-app messaging, credential verification, and payroll integration.

workData.title: Pet Rescue & Adoption System
workData.description: A compassionate platform connecting rescued pets with loving homes. Includes pet profiles, adoption applications, rescue organization management, donation processing, and success story showcase.
